snippet: Kingfisher Airlines tussles with employees, some of whom have not been paid in months.
abstract: Kingfisher Airlines tussles with employees, some of whom have not been paid in months.
lead_paragraph: Kingfisher Airlines canceled several flights Monday because of employee unrest, “a fresh blow to the ailing carrier that sent its share price down by the daily limit of 5 percent,” Reuters reported.

headline.main: Kingfisher Airlines Cuts Flights, Citing Labor Unrest
